pacman.algorithms

Class GreedyAlgorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • pacman.algorithms.AbstractAlgorithm
      • pacman.algorithms.GreedyAlgorithm
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AStarAlgorithm

    public class GreedyAlgorithm
extends AbstractAlgorithm
    Defines an algorithm that let the agent applies the greedy search algorithm at each step.
    Version:
    1.0
